name: addgitpath
description: Automatically use git to do the version management path into the production environment when packaging the production environment, so that colleagues can locate the path and owner of the project.（在生产环境打包时自动将使用git做版本管理的路径打入到生产环境中，方便同事定位该项目的路径以及拥有者）
author: https://github.com/pcjgithub
